page.title: 09NORRIS HILL FARM
page.content: There has been a farm on this site since at least 1759 and the present owner has been there all his life, which is well over 50 years.The farm was originally 150 acres but much has been sold for housing and now is only 24 acres.It is mainly used for pig farming,over 700 animals,but it also has some beef stock.Other animals include goats,chickens and a 36 year old horse.The main change in the farm has been from dairy to meat production but no major changes are seen in the future.Being a farmer in a built up area has its problems mainly dogs chasing the animals and trespassers.
